text: The Black Forest cake, also called Schwarzwälder Kirschtorte, is an authentic German cake made up of a chocolate layer cake with cherries in the middle and whipped cream on top. They are traditionally made with fresh Morello cherries, poached in a sugar syrup and pitted. It is a variation of the chocolate cake, and sometimes decorated with chocolate curls.Periplus Mini Cookbooks Classic Essential Cakes == Gallery == Image:CherryCakeSchwarzwald.jpg|A Schwarzwälder Kirschtorte Image:Schwarzwälder Kirschtorte.jpg|Cherry Black Forest Cake Image:Kirschtorte.jpg|Another Black Forest Cake == References == Category:Cakes Category:German food
title: Black Forest cake
